Zelda Nolte (afọ 1929 rụọ afọ 2003) bụ onye South Africa-British sculptor na woodblock printmaker.

Zelda Nolte gụkwara akwụkwọ na Kunstgewerbeschule Zürich n'okpuru nduzi nke Johannes Itten, nke ghọrọ Zürcher Hochschule der Künste, na ihe ọkpụkpụ, na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum nke Cape Town n'okpuru Prọfesọ Lippy Lipshitz
Nolte nọchitere anya South Africa n'afọ 1963 Sao Paulo Bienale
O nwere ọrụ na nchịkọta nke Iziko South African National Gallery, Cape Town na New Hall Art Collection, University of Cambridge
Ihe ngosi ahọpụtara n'afọ 1978 site na Zelda Nolte Exhibition catalogue nkè afọ 1978, Hobson Gallery, Cambridge, UK
(archive):
1960 South African Quadrennial Exhibition, National Gallery Cape Town, South Africa
1962 National Art Gallery, Port Elizabeth, South African
1963 Ngosipụta nke Onwe, Association of Arts Gallery, Cape Town, South Africa
1963 Sao Paolo Biennale, Brazil
1964 Johannesburg Festival Exhibition, Milner Park, Johannesburg, South Africa
Africau1963 New Orleans International Exhibition, USA
1964 South African Art Today, National Gallery, Cape Town, South Africa
1964 "Group Six", Wolpe Gallery, Cape Town, South Africa
1965 Lidchi Gallery, Johannesburg, South Africa
1965 National Gallery, Salisbury (Harare), Zimbabwe
1968 Group Exhibition, AIA Gallery, London, UK
1971 Ngosipụta nke Onwe, Artist House Gallery, Jerusalem.
1972 Florence Biennale International Exhibition of Graphic Art, Florence, Italy
1973 Group Exhibition, Binyanei Ha'Ouma, Jerusalem
1974 National Art Gallery Cape Town, "50 Years Michaelis", Cape Town, South Africa
1977 Kettles Yard, Cambridge, Cambridge Society of Painters and Sculptors Group Exhibition, Cambridge, UK
